title: i need help asap
body: ok so my LoL client is no longer launching i had a windows update that glitched on me 4 times i did fix it but it got rid of my old LoL client that i had on this pc but now the client won't even launch after the updates also at one point in time it said i had something wrong with my files i think im not so sure anyway plz help me!

replies.body: Hmmmmm since you mentioned updating windows it almost makes me think this is [**permission**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) related, but there's not quite enough info here to be sure of that yet. Go ahead and update those permissions, but also feel free to hit me back up with any more info like what kind of errors you're seeing and I can do a little more troubleshooting!
Ok so i've updated the perms still not working...
also i am now reinstalling with all the old files deleted seeing if it'll help
ITS FIXED THANK YOU SO MUCH!
